segments.text: The winter in Ottawa is freezing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: From mid-November , snow started to pile up in Ottawa .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I will be adapted to it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Although the weather here is very cold , the people are warm .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's the reason why I remain here .
segments.speaker: S1
